summary: Thorsen is a nord warrior, waiting for you at the four shields tavern in Dragonbridge
descriptionHtml:
Check out my other mods [u][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/6886180/?tb=mods&pUp=1]HERE[/url][/u]

Thorsen Witch-hunter is a Nord warrior, who travels along Skyrim to search and destroy witches.
You can find him at the Four Shields Tavern, in Dragondridge.

He wears merchant clothes, and has a custom armor in is inventory. He will equip it as soon as you recruit him.
He prefers dual-wield with a pair of akaviri katanas.

Thorsen use a custom body texture with tatoos, it is made from Chris57 and FavoredSoul "Better Males" mod.
The textures is also compatible with vanilla male bodies, I don't know about others.
You should have a try to "better males".

His perks are Dual Flurry, Figthing Stance, Bladesman, Hack and Slash, Savage Strike ans Stealth.
He is powereful, but not overpowered.


[b][i][color=blue]VERSION[/color] FRANÇAISE [color=red]DISPONIBLE[/color] sur la page des téléchargements.[/i][/b]

[u][size=4]CREDITS AND THANKS :[/size][/u]

The body texture used is
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2488/?]Better males - Beautiful nudes and faces - New hairstyles by Chris57 and FavoredSoul[/url]
It is also compatible with vanilla male bodies

Thorsen's custom armor is made from Str8maverick meshes
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34051/?]Duelists Longcoat by str8maverick[/url]
and the great retexture from Jerros
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35516/?]Steel Dragon Longcoat by str8maverick and Jerros[/url]

Thorsen's eyepatch is
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26230/?]Sharlikrans Compatibility Patches by Various[/url] made from
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1874/?]Bandit Eyepatch by Ceekay9[/url]

Thanks to you to provide use of your works !!!
author: ZorlackPanzer
